class.name: GraphFrame
class.brief_description: GraphFrame is a special [BaseGraphNode] that can be used to organize other nodes inside a [GraphEdit].
class.description: A GraphFrame is drawn behind other [BaseGraphNode]s and can be used to organize them. It can be used to group nodes together, label them and make the graph clearer. If a GraphFrame is moved, all the nodes inside it will be moved as well including other GraphFrames.

method.name: get_titlebar_hbox
method.description: Returns the [HBoxContainer] used for the title bar, only containing a [Label] for displaying the title by default. This can be used to add custom controls to the title bar such as option or close buttons.
